Index.meta_title: AutoMBS - AI-Assisted Medical Coding for Australian Healthcare
Index.meta_description: Streamline hospital coding with AI-powered MBS code suggestions, clinical note analysis, and automated compliance reporting.

Hero.title: AI-Powered <important>Medical Coding</important> for Australian Healthcare
Hero.description: Transform clinical notes into accurate MBS codes with AI assistance. Reduce coding time, improve accuracy, and ensure compliance with Medicare Benefits Schedule requirements.

Features.section_title: Streamline Medical Coding with AI Intelligence
Features.section_description: AutoMBS combines artificial intelligence with healthcare expertise to transform clinical documentation into accurate MBS codes.
Features.feature1_description: Advanced AI processes clinical notes to identify key medical procedures, diagnoses, and billable services.
Features.feature2_description: Get intelligent MBS code recommendations with confidence scores and alternative suggestions.
Features.feature3_description: Track supporting evidence from clinical notes for each suggested code to ensure compliance.
Features.feature4_description: Generate comprehensive reports for auditing and quality assurance purposes.
Features.feature5_description: Monitor coding accuracy and coverage rates to continuously improve performance.
Features.feature6_description: Seamlessly integrate with existing hospital coding workflows and systems.

Pricing.section_title: Unlock the Full Potential of the SaaS Template
Pricing.section_description: A free and open-source landing page template for your SaaS business, built with React, TypeScript, Shadcn UI, and Tailwind CSS.

CTA.title: Ready to Transform Medical Coding?
